trans-unit.source: You must keep the copyright and credits for authors, illustrators, etc.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You must keep the copyright and credits for authors, illustrators, etc.

trans-unit.source: You are free to make commercial use of this work.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You are free to make commercial use of this work.

trans-unit.source: You may adapt and add to this work.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You may adapt and add to this work.

trans-unit.source: You may adapt and add to this work, but you may distribute the resulting work only under the same or similar license to this one.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You may adapt and add to this work, but you may distribute the resulting work only under the same or similar license to this one.

trans-unit.source: You may not make changes or build upon this work without permission.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You may not make changes or build upon this work without permission.

trans-unit.source: You may not use this work for commercial purposes.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You may not use this work for commercial purposes.

trans-unit.source: You can copy, modify, and distribute this work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
trans-unit.note: See http://creativecommons.org/ to find out how this is normally translated in your language. What we're aiming for here is an easy to understand summary.
trans-unit.target: You can copy, modify, and distribute this work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

trans-unit.source: For permission to reuse, contact the copyright holder.
trans-unit.note: This is used when all we have is a copyright, no other license.

trans-unit.note: When you choose a Creative Commons License, this label shows over the text box at the bottom.
The meaning of "non-commercial" is vague but important. This hyperlink takes you somewhere that defines it.
{0} is replaced by an untranslatable abbreviation functioning as an adjective ("CC0")

While this screen allows it, legally you can't enforce any additions to a creative commons license. This link takes you to the clause that says that. This link is visible only if you choose Creative Commons but then type in the "Additional Request" box.

trans-unit.source: This may also hide other buttons which are not needed by the non-advanced user.
